name: Patchy Patients
description:
You're trapped in your laboratory wielding a bandage gun.
Your creations wander around, bleeding slime.
A flood builds up , destined to drown you. 

Your goal ?!?!
To survive as long as possible. Use your bandage gun to heal the 'Frankies'.

Players with the 5 highest times will get listed on a leaderboard in-game. The player who remains at 1st place at the end of the event (17th of April 2020) will win all the received donations.
The Prize Pool is now at 45$ USD!!!  Yeah I know right, what other indie game developer is giving cash incentives to beat their games...
Details on how to submit your time-score are listed  in-game.

If there are two or more players with the same score the prize money will go to earliest submission.
Payment will be done via PayPal.

This game was originally created for Global-Game-Jam 2020 under the theme of repair. Thank you!

Controls = listed in-game.

Xbox controller supported as well.
